SELECT I.ITEM_CODE AS "ITEM_CODE", ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_COUNT, LISTAGG(CL.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CL.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME) AS "ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME" FROM ITEM I LEFT JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY C ON I.ITEM_CODE = C.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY_LIST CL ON C.ITEM_CATEGORY_NO = CL.ITEM_CATEGORY_NO GROUP BY I.ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_COUNT ORDER BY I.ITEM_CODE
